marklogic.body:
I was making the point yesterday over at that the Greens are far, far more dangerous and extremist than the ludicrous George Galloway and his cat suit. I did my best to spread that meme everywhere....
This, naturally, goes down like a plate of Cold sick. Moderators where stepping in to no criticism of Carloine Lucas would see the light of day.
One supported of Lucas, a constituent and fan of her work, told me she looked forward to my 'lamp post day'. I suppose this is when the glorious green revolution happens. Charming!
And all because I dont agree with the Guardian 'consensus'. They like to paint us as the nasty ones, but all I want to happen to my political opponents is for the to just b8gger and stop interfering in my life.
Now I am to be diagnosed as having a mental disorder. Perhaps we defectives will be shipped Off quietly to some backwoods mental home for 'special treatment', this of course, is a common practice in the left leaning world.
